name: Fantasy Game That Takes Place In A Super Market
name_original: Fantasy Game That Takes Place In A Super Market
description:
You go to your local fantasy super market, only to find out that the store owner plans to conveniently release an ancient evil from a box, an evil that could destroy the world! He will only stop if you buy at least six items form the store be careful not to spend too much! But beware, some of the other shoppers are not so friendly... 

Made by me and two friends.

Put items on the counter to get a description and put the items in the funnel to buy them. Pick them up with left click. 

Glitches - You buy two magic wands at once, only buy both colours if you want to go bankrupt

- If you lose please reopen the game if you want to get the true good ending, otherwise the items you bought before carry over so reset!
